import React from 'react' import './vacancies.css' import {useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { handleClick } from '../../store/slices/headerSlice' function Vacansies() { const vacancions = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.vacancions) const animArrow = useSelector(state => state.menuBar.animArrow) const dispatch = useDispatch() const style_1 = { transform: 'translate(1000px, 0px)', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease' }; const style_2 = { transform: 'translate(0px, 0px)', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease' }; return (

{o.name}
)}
